name: 黃希敏
objective: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
schedule:
1.　　Applied linguistics
2.　　Prescribing and describing: popular and academic views of “correctness”
3.　　Languages in the contemporary world
4.　　English Language Teaching
5.　　HOLIDAY
6.　　Language and communication
7.　　Context and culture
8.　　Persuasion and poetics; rhetoric and resistance
9.　　Past, present, and future directions
10.　　MIDTERM
11.　　Applying linguistics: disciplines, theories, models, descriptions
12.　　Language and languages
13.　　Modeling languages: the raw materials of applied linguistics
14.　　Language acquisition: methods and metaphors
15.　　Language as discourse: speech and writing in applied linguistics
16.　　Applied linguistics as professional discourse
17.　　Review
18.　　FINAL
materials:
1. Guy Cook: Applied Linguistics (Oxford University Press)
2. Michael McCarthy: Issues in Applied Linguistics (Cambridge University Press)
